mapper.select: SELECT y.courseCategoryCode courseCode, y.courseCategoryName courseName, y.alreadyStudySum alreadyStudySum, c.canQty, s.coursesId, s.userId, s.studentId FROM t_student_class s, t_courses c, t_course_category y WHERE s.coursesId = c.id AND y.courseCategoryCode = c.courseCode AND s.userId = #{userId}
